amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency (combined heat and power systems) by $15.5 million and to reduce funding for Weapons Activities by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the Renewable Energy, Energy Reliability, and Efficiency account by $15,500,000 and reduce funds in the Weapons Activities account by $15,500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 242 (Roll no. 322).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Connolly amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 242 (Roll no. 322).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Connolly.
